name: Life is Simu
description:
Life is Simu is a mini survival horror game with a unique 2 player element. It is best to play with 2 player to have a complete game experience.  I forgot to mention this in the game but you can hold shift to run. The second player will have to click on this google drive link to direct the first player. https://drive.google.com/open?id=1xkDQRVdrrN05AyOOsE8rWD_gJuBLTyOC  

Overall I hope you enjoy it and have fun.
